base_description: Tall, narrow, white bookshelf with minimalist design.
part_description: Four open shelves and a closed cabinet at the bottom, vertically aligned. Each shelf is rectangular, evenly spaced. Cabinet has a door with a handle.
internal_interaction_description: Shelves are evenly spaced, providing uniform storage areas. The cabinet door swings open to reveal additional storage space, secured by a handle. The structure is designed for stability, with shelves securely attached to the frame, ensuring balanced weight distribution.
external_interaction_description: The bookshelf can hold books, decorative items, or storage boxes on its shelves. The cabinet provides concealed storage for personal items. It can be placed against a wall to save space and may require anchoring for added stability. Suitable for home or office use.
